parameters.name: DBInstanceCategories
parameters.description: The edition of the instance. Separate multiple values with commas (,).

parameters.name: DBInstanceIds
parameters.description: The instance ID. Separate multiple values with commas (,).

parameters.name: DBInstanceModes
parameters.description: The resource type of the instance. Separate multiple values with commas (,).

parameters.name: InstanceDeployTypes
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used.

parameters.name: InstanceNetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **VPC**: virtual private cloud (VPC).
*   **Classic**: classic network.

> If you do not specify this parameter, instances of all network types are returned.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The VPC ID. You can use this parameter to filter instances that reside in the specified VPC.
